name: Literally Out Of Control (ossyahya60)
description:
This is an early prototype of an idea where:

Story:

A robot is not into the idea of being controlled, can you find a way to reach the goal?

Gameplay:

The game is interactable mainly by mouse button, where you manipulate the environment to move the character and deliver him to the goal.

Note: This game is physics based game, so everything is affected by physics!
